channel.title: Dueling
channel.description:
Hey Guys, Im Using Devolution 7.0 Source And To Stop The Ever So Common Duping Problem I Would Like To Know How To Stop Any Sort Of Interface (Pop-Up) Coming Up While Dueling. For Example, I Was Dueling And The Stake Was A Phat Set And Both Players Clicked The Report Abuse Button Or Typed Players And Both Got The Stake. How Can I Stop Players Opening Anyhting While Dueling Until The Duel Is Over.
All Help Is Appreciated. :)
Ps. Do Not Leave Any Useless spamming Comments Like "Press Ctrl+A The Delete"

item.title: Dueling
item.dc:creator: @akanaz akanaz
item.description:
@akanaz wrote:

Wheres My Boolean?
What Is A Void And How Do I Know What One I Use When Opening My Interface?
Could You Supply Me With Search “Whatever I Need To Find”
Ps. Sorry Ive Never Done This Sort Of Interface Stuff Before :P[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 31, 2007, 01:47:07 AM[/size][hr]Err DO YOu Have Any Idea What Case Opens Duel Cause Theres A Case For Duel Req And Everything Else Im Not Sure Which Your Talking About

item.title: Dueling
item.dc:creator: @xx_nub_xx xx nub xx
item.description:
@xx_nub_xx wrote:

add this boolean

public boolean canOpenInterface = true;

then under the case for opening the duel screen, put this

canOpenInterface = false;

and also under the case for accepting the stake and starting the duel put this

canOpenInterface = true;

and then in whatever void you use to open interfaces, put this

if(canOpenInterface) {

at the beginning, and add another closing bracket at the end.

That should work but i havnt tested that at all i just wrote it in the post box.

Read full topic
